咁你離職
D錢要由供款賬戶轉去個人賬戶
個人賬戶認到你入錢既指示係保本基金
所以轉哂做保本基金

普通果個︰
Sun Life MPF Hong Kong Equity Fund is an open-end unit trust established in Hong Kong. The Fund's objective is to provide long-term capital appreciation. The Fund invests in an insurance policy that engages in equities and equity-related securities (including warrants and convertible bonds) listed on the Stock Exchange of Hong Kong Limited.
source: https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/CMGRHEA:HK

富時果個︰
Sun Life FTSE MPF Hong Kong Index Fund is an open-fund incorporated in Hong Kong.This fund seeks to provide members with investment results that, before fees and expenses, closely track the performance of the FTSE MPF Hong Kong Index.
source: https://www.bloomberg.com/quote/SFMHKIA:HK

Sun Life MPF Hong Kong Equity Fund is an open-end unit trust established in Hong Kong. The Fund's objective is to provide long-term capital appreciation.
